name: fio
normalized: okay, yuu-san.
take a breath and calm down

name: yuu
normalized: …hah.
thank you
she had poured a hot cup of cocoa for me andplaced it on my desk.

name: fio
normalized: so, yuu-san…umm, what in the world was goingon earlier…?
earlier" of course meant the matter with misleetwho had seized the opportunity to get out of her cell.
but, that didn't mean fio had seen the whole picture.
this rookie space detective had only seen whathad happened after i had been tackled by misleet.

name: yuu
normalized: yes, i had forgotten about misleet's restraints andlocking the photon grid.
it was entirely my mistake
normally, the person doing the interrogation wasresponsible for the comings and goings of a detention cell,and i apologized for forgetting regulations.

name: fio
normalized: y, yeah.
i see, but…umm

name: yuu
normalized: i've got to be honest with you about misleet,it was my mistake that i was hasty with my judgment…what kind of punishment should i incur?
i added one thing on top of another to the softheartedfio who still wasn't able to grasp what was going onsomewhere.

name: fio
normalized: n, no way.
i can't do anything like punish yuu-san.
in hindsight, you did stop misleet-san…
and then, as expected, this little girl who had placedtrust in "yuu saitou", wasn't getting involved in theresponsibility of the interrogation any more than that.

name: fio
normalized: but, misleet-san earlier, she was acting a little strange …saying "ghost" and such…
but, it appeared that she was still caught up onsomething and had titled her head to the side in doubt.

name: fio
normalized: hey, yuu-san.
you wouldn't mind telling me what kind ofconversation you were having with misleet up until earlier,i wonder?
and then, the question came out like it was only natural.

name: yuu
normalized: …well you see.
i was asking a little about misleet-san's past
anticipating what she was going to say, i opened my mouth.

name: fio
normalized: misleet's…past?

name: yuu
normalized: yes, it was a conversation about how she became thetop leader of dozuma.
bureau chief, are you familiar withthe name isha d.
isurumina?
and then, i had slowly asked while sensing theintonation of them being lost.

name: fio
normalized: isha…san?
isha, isha…?
umm…i feel like i'veheard or seen her from somewhere, but…?

name: yuu
normalized: i think it's probably because they were inside of thedocuments concerning misleet.
maybe it was because ihad asked her about things relating to isha…
speaking honestly, the utterances themselves werepretty much a "at the last moment" kind of thing.
but, i felt i had to do something based on the uneasyglance fio had turned my way after what had happened.

name: yuu
normalized: maybe it's possibly related to something that happenedin misleet's past.
that could also be the reason why shewent into a frenzy when i mentioned isha's name…
if a person knew my true character, then they'd beable to see the truth.
on the contrary, if a person didn't know my truecharacter, a lie to deceive was a sure thing.
i had spoken, choosing at my own discretion tobalance on the boundary of a lie and a truth.
even though fio's feeling of uneasiness was pointedat me, it was towards "yuu saitou" as an earthlingthrough and through.
it was expected that some doubt would be sewn towardsme regarding the real reason misleet had acted violentlyearlier.

name: fio
normalized: i…see…, misleet-san's past…
and then, almost as expected, fio's interest turnedin my direction.

name: fio
normalized: hey…yuu-san?

name: yuu
normalized: eh…?
but, fio's eyes that i thought were going to turntowards mine had most surely strayed.
in some respects, she had a much more meek look than before.

name: yuu
normalized: is, is something wrong?
all the same, my voice caught at that expression offio's that i didn't see very often.

name: fio
normalized: ah…uh, umm.
…yeah
and then, after an interval like she was conflictedwith something for a few seconds, fio gave a big nod.

name: fio
normalized: yuu-san, i don't know if this is a good time for this,but you wouldn't mind going out on patrol with me, i wonder?

name: yuu
normalized: patrol?

name: fio
normalized: yeah…
not understanding the reasoning behind it,i nodded my head at fio who was waiting for me to respondwith slightly upturned eyes and a nod.

name: fio
normalized: ah, yuu-san.
stop here

name: yuu
normalized: eh?
okay
after about ten minutes of riding in the vehicle onpatrol, i slowly stepped on the brakes on fio's instruction.

name: yuu
normalized: here we are…
if i'm not mistaken, it had been the place wherewe had fought misleet a few days ago.
misleet's apprehension had been a big news item evenon this planet and people were now coming and goingwith a good sense of security and calmness.

name: fio
normalized: all right
while i was thinking about such things, fio hadgotten out of the vehicle leading me on.

name: fio
normalized: yuu-san, i missed the chance to ask you earlier,but how is misleet's interrogation going?
i answered as fio seemed to stare at the scenerybefore her eyes, locked in thought the same as me.

name: yuu
normalized: well, i was able to talk to her more or less,but to be perfectly honest, i still didn't get anyimportant information at all today…
in reality, i wasn't interested in the slightestin such things and had shook my head lightly.

name: fio
normalized: is that so…
and then, fio dropped her shoulders a little inresponse to that like it was as she feared…

name: fio
normalized: we really have to hurry up and save everyone…

name: yuu
normalized: …eh?
i frowned at fio's continued response.

name: yuu
normalized: …"everyone"?
who in the world did she mean by that?

name: fio
normalized: …eh?
fio's expression became dim just then.

name: fio
normalized: yuu-san?

name: yuu
normalized: ah, ahh right.
you mean everyone involved in misleet's"human hunting", huh
she had caught me by surprise.
i rushed to smooth over fio's sad expression.

name: yuu
normalized: since they probably haven't been taken off of earth yet,we really have to get the information out of misleet andhurry to rescue them, huh?

name: fio
normalized: y…yeah
fio nodded a little at me continuing while feelingthat i was starting to talk a bit rapidly.
